Package sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan

Class LeaverConfigBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan.LeaverConfigBuilder
  • public class LeaverConfigBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class allows to create and configure LeaverConfigBuilder.

      • forEveryone

        public static LeaverConfigBuilder forEveryone()
        Returns:
        new LeaverConfigBuilder instance with defined group of identities set to null

      • forPopulation

        public static LeaverConfigBuilder forPopulation​(GroupDefinition groupDefinition)
                                         throws GeneralException
        Method for creation LeaverConfigBuilder with predefined group population.
        Parameters:
        groupDefinition - group population, which will be used in PopulationLeaverConfigProvider
        Returns:
        new LeaverConfigBuilder instance with defined group of identities set to given GroupDefinition
        Throws:
        GeneralException - when provided group definition is null

      • forPopulation

        public static LeaverConfigBuilder forPopulation​(SailPointContext context,
                                                java.lang.String groupDefinitionName)
                                         throws GeneralException
        Method for creation LeaverConfigBuilder with predefined group population.
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext that provides an API to access persistence store and core system operations
        groupDefinitionName - group population's name, by which GroupPopulation will be retrieved from context.
        Returns:
        new LeaverConfigBuilder instance with defined group of identities set to given GroupDefinition
        Throws:
        GeneralException - when provided group definition is null

        Parameters:
        appName - application to set configuration for.
        mode - to set for account disabling option.
        Returns:

                                                          java.lang.String property,
                                                          java.lang.String operation,
                                                          java.lang.Object... values)
        Method adds entitlement exception property, entitlement exception operation and entitlement exception ID values to "entitlementException" property in config for given application name.
        Parameters:
        appName - application to set configuration for.
        property - entitlement property to be set as exceptional.
        operation - entitlement operation to be set as exceptional.
        values - IDs to be set as exceptional.
        Returns:
        this LeaverConfigBuilder instance.

      • build
